span.span: Converts a to a string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 转换 为一个字符串，该字符串表示 以64、编码墨迹序列化格式 (ISF) 的字符串。The converts a to a string that represents the in base-64, encoded Ink Serialized Format (ISF). 如果无法存储原始字节数据（如网页中的数据），可以将墨迹数据存储为64，并将其存储为。It is useful to store ink data as base-64, encoded ISF when it is not possible to store raw byte data, such as in Web pages. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将64编码的 ISF 字符串转换为 。The following example demonstrates how to convert a base-64, encoded ISF string to a . 这假设存在一个名为 的 `presenter` 。This assumes that there is an called `presenter`. [!code-csharp[InkEraser#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InkEraser/CSharp/InkEraser.cs#8)] [!code-vb[InkEraser#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InkEraser/VisualBasic/InkEraser.vb#8)] [!code-csharp[InkEraser#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InkEraser/CSharp/InkEraser.cs#3)] [!code-vb[InkEraser#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InkEraser/VisualBasic/InkEraser.vb#3)]
